titles.title: Unlocking Capital for Small Businesses Act of 2024
Unlocking Capital for Small Businesses Act of 2024
A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to create a safe harbor for finders and private placement brokers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
